commit.message:
Merge pull request #3606 from matklad/audit

Make audit more reliable

verification.payload:
tree b80c7f476f02e9bfec7b4be1529283b516056399
parent ebab250b6bffaafb347ce431d5f4c9eeab4aa7e3
parent 1aa5d5dc2169758f511db2db186c95833ab11c12
author Aleksey Kladov <aleksey.kladov@gmail.com> 1584368084 +0100
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1584368084 +0100

Merge pull request #3606 from matklad/audit

Make audit more reliable

files.patch:
@@ -104,7 +104,7 @@ jobs:
     - run: npm ci
       working-directory: ./editors/code
 
-    - run: npm audit
+    - run: npm audit || sleep 10 && npm audit || sleep 30 && npm audit
       working-directory: ./editors/code
 
     - run: npm run lint
